title: Enhancing E-Learning Competencies: Genetics Project Learning Based on the Integrated ASIE Model

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core genetics concepts (gene expression, inheritance laws, chromosome structure) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can systematically analyze and solve genetics problems following the ASIE model stages (Activity-Exploration-Explanation-Expansion).
Learners can complete a smartphone-based genetic analysis project and write a results report.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
